laureates.motivation: "as a tribute to the consummate artistry, permeated with idealism, which he has demonstrated during his long productive career as a lyric poet, dramatist, novelist and writer of world-renowned short stories"
"for acting as a link between the peace societies of the various countries, and helping them to organize the world rallies of the international peace movement"
"for his work on the equation of state for gases and liquids"
"in recognition of the contributions to our knowledge of cell chemistry made through his work on proteins, including the nucleic substances"
